response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-end solution at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
